text: "Hand of Fate" is a song recorded by American country music group Sons of the Desert. It was released in August 1997 as the second single from the album Whatever Comes First. The song reached #33 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Michael Noble and Michael Lunn. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Chart (1997) !
